data.text:
The check-in experience was an unpleasant one. No one shared with me any details regarding where the breakfast is and what the Internet access code is.

I've been trying to call reception, and no one answered till now for almost 15 min.

The room has stains.
data.title: Bad Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Novotel JVT.

It is always a pleasure to receive constructive feedback, which helps us improve our services. Please be assured that your feedback is taken very seriously and has been conveyed to the top management.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be a pleasant one.

Warm regards,
The Management
owner_response.author: Marketing Team

data.text:
Sai Reddy is very supportive, helped us a lot, we truely appreciate his great help.

He demonstrated very good professional attitude, and excellent skills on solving the network problem for us. 

The room is very clean, and we really enjoy staying in the hotel.
data.title: One excellent experience in Novetel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you so much for your kind rating and review. We are grateful that you enjoyed your stay with us.

We strive hard to ensure all our guests can have a memorable stay and we are glad you experienced the same.

We will convey your regards to the team and we hope you will give us a chance to welcome you again.

Warm Regards
The Management
owner_response.author: Marketing Team

data.text: The receptionist pampha  / ahmed was very welcoming person and Lance was generous and give me an upgrade üòÅ.. already loved the high quality welcoming from the hotel and the staff. Cant wait to enjoy my suite and have an amazing high floor view.
data.title: Amazing and exellent

data.text:
The venue is all new, very clean and spacious. 
The staff is very gentle and always available, in particular Nixon. 
They have a lot of space outodoor, like terraces and patios for hanging out.
The location is well connected to the rest of the city.
The only negative side is the food: the restaurants inside offer low quality food.
data.title: My stay in Novotel JVT

user_location.name: Mulazzano, Coriano, Province of Rimini, Emilia-Romagna

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.
	
We are utterly delighted to read your review, we have communicated your feedback to the management for further review and we are looking forward to welcoming you again.
	
Warm Regards
The Management
owner_response.author: Marketing Team

data.text: I had a lovely stay during Untold Festival weekend and would recommend this hotel for those who would like to attend next year‚Äôs festival as well. I would like to commend Shehzad Afridi for making my stay as smooth as possible upon arrival to smooth checkin until my departure. He ensured that my stay was entirely satisfactory along with Tahir, Mohit, Anita and Ismail from Thyme restaurant. I loved the clear vegetable soup and how the chef would prepare my sunny side up eggs just the way I like it. The staff were very helpful and the view from the balcony is breathtaking. Hopefully when I return the hotel pool  will be operational aside from the Movenpick pool but nonetheless it was definitely a relaxing weekend and I can‚Äôt wait to be back.
data.title: Great location near Expo City!
